subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: As Hazeltine’s 7,674-yard layout is the longest in major championship history, Phil Mickelson, and everyone else, will need to be long and straight to score well.
snippet: As Hazeltine’s 7,674-yard layout is the longest in major championship history, Phil Mickelson, and everyone else, will need to be long and straight to score well.
